tool_description: Identifies and filters statistical outliers from comparable sales data using configurable methods to improve valuation accuracy.

sale_prices.description: Array of comparable property sale prices

outlier_method.description: Method for outlier detection: iqr, zscore, or modified_zscore

threshold_factor.description: Threshold multiplier for outlier detection sensitivity (1.0-3.0)

error_messages: Insufficient data: At least 3 sale prices are required for outlier detection.
Invalid outlier method: Use one of: iqr, zscore, or modified_zscore.
Invalid threshold factor: threshold_factor must be between 1.0 and 3.0.
All values identical: Cannot detect outliers when all sale prices are the same.
usage: Provide array of comparable sale prices. Optionally specify outlier detection method and sensitivity threshold. Returns filtered dataset with outliers identified and removed.

outlier_indices.description: Original array indices of identified outliers

outliers_removed.description: Number of outliers identified and removed

remaining_count.description: Number of comparable sales remaining after filtering
